pages.content: When multiple practitioners combine their power, they can achieve feats impossible for a single mage. Community summoning requires perfect synchronization between participants.
The bell serves as both a focus and a timing device, ensuring all participants channel their energy at precisely the right moment.

data.description: Summons a powerful ally to aid the community

pages.content: Warning: Failed community rituals can have catastrophic consequences. Ensure all participants are experienced and prepared.
